comment: He gives the review session before every test. You need to read the textbook before going to class.  It takes some time to get used to his accent. Lectures make good use of powerpoints.

His lectures are taken straight from the textbook's powerpoints and could be somewhat useful if you can understand him. His accent takes some time to get used to. The course material itself is quite easy - but expect to be doing most of the learning yourself through the textbook. Thankfully the textbook is very clear. He doesn't know how to teach.
